Hello! I am Morgan Mathison, a current senior at the University of Missouri majoring in Plant Science with an emphasis in Breeding, Biology, and Biotechnology. I am also completing a minor in Biology. I have a strong interest in plant evolution, ecology, and morphology. This site serves as a collection of my current and previous research projects as well as academic projects and accomplishments!
